data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Describe traditional clothes in your country.
data.answer: I'm going to describe traditional clothes in my country. There are many types of clothing in my country, among which clothing made of silk is the most representative. Silk is a kind of textile, which is woven from silk or synthetic fiber, man-made fiber, staple silk, etc. Besides, silk is a special product of China. The ancient working people of China invented and produced silk products on a large scale, which opened the first large-scale trade exchange between the East and the West in world history, known as the "Silk Road". Since the Western Han Dynasty, Chinese silk has been shipped to foreign countries in large quantities, becoming a famous product. At that time, the road from China to the West was also called the Silk Road by European countries, and China was also called the "Silk Country". Both men and women can wear it. (145)

options.content: What materials were they made of?
